detail_desc: Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front, soft pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a metal button. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Calf-length coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and long, slightly wider raglan sleeves. Lined.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Short skirt in imitation suede with a high waist with pleats and a tie belt. Concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.

Soft, non-wired bandeau bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dress in an airy, floral-print weave with a small, frilled collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck, and long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Nursing jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. High slits in the sides for easier nursing access. Slightly longer at the back.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boleros in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped sparkly stone button at the top.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a lace yoke and shoulders.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed drawstring, a zip at the hems and reflective details.
Sweatpants in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and straight legs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Shirt in washed linen with a grandad collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with faux fur ears on top.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Chinos in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft printed jersey.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length, V-neck dress in airy, patterned chiffon with pleats at the shoulders, short sleeves, covered buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with pleats. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and a flounce with overlocked edges on the sleeves.
Suede ankle boots with peep toes, open lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Strapless bandeau bras in microfibre with jersey-lined cups and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Side support and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Loose-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Short dress in a lightly crêped weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Short sleeves, a flap chest pocket and a narrow tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Ankle boots with a stretch shaft, square toes and block heels. Jersey linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Oversized, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets. Lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and broderie anglaise flutter sleeves.

Short, straight-cut tunic in soft, washed denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend. Collar, button placket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and flap chest pockets. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit, patterned viscose with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Fitted blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline and a small opening with ties at the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, and smocking at the back.

Knee-length dress in a crinkled weave with pleats front and back, a small frilled collar and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and a covered button, and a gentle flare to the hem. Partly lined.

Oversized padded gilet in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Contrasting colour lining and polyester filling.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and metal front fastening.
Classic T-shirt in soft, gently draping jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Straight cut with short sleeves.
Short top in an airy cotton weave. Square neckline with a narrow elastication, short, elasticated puff sleeves and elasticated hem.
Shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. Elasticated waist, side pockets and contrasting colour piping at the sides.
Blouse in crinkled satin with a small collar and V-neck opening with a concealed button at the front. Gathered shoulder seams, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Microfibre Brazilian briefs with laser-cut edges, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers and hat in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with sewn-on ears.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with lace sections, a V-neck and straight-cut hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a deeper neckline, long sleeves and elasticated gathers front and back. Unlined.
Leggings in washed, stretch, patterned denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with a wider neckline, print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Pre-tied bow tie in velvet with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 10 cm.

Fitted, knee-length cold shoulder dress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide, double-layered flounce with covered elastication at the top that continues over the sleeves. Short, cotton-lined puff sleeves with concealed elastication for added volume. Concealed zip in one side and a slit at the back. Lined at the top.

Knee-length dress in airy organza with a frill-trimmed square neckline front and back and smocking at the top. Short puff sleeves with frill trims and a softly draping, A-line skirt with a frill detail at the hem. Partly lined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
A-line skirt in twill made from a cotton blend with fake pockets and buttons at the front.
Wide-fitting T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and dropped shoulders.
Long-sleeved bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the neckline.
A pair of large metal hoop earrings decorated with stone-like plastic beads. Diameter 6 cm.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a deep neckline that has gathers at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam with concealed elastication under the bust.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring and a concealed key pocket in the waistband, and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a concealed drawstring at the waist with a key pocket in the waistband.
